sourcesContent:
Server Name Players Ip Map Country Status
{{ server.name }} {{ server.players }} {{ server.ip }}:{{ server.port }} {{ server.map }} {{ server.country.toUpperCase() }}
{{ server.status }}
Transactions report
// src/app/retailers/retailers.component.ts import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from '../data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-retailers', templateUrl: './retailers.component.html', styleUrls: ['./retailers.component.scss'] }) export class RetailersComponent implements OnInit { data: any; constructor(private dataService: DataService) {} ngOnInit() { this.dataService.getData().subscribe(response => { this.data = response.data.map((server: any) => ({ name: server.attributes.name, players: server.attributes.players, ip: server.attributes.ip, map: server.attributes.details.map, country: server.attributes.country.toLowerCase(), // Ensure country code is lowercase status: server.attributes.status, port: server.attributes.port })); console.log(this.data); }); } joinServer(ip: string, port: number): void { const steamConnectUrl = `steam://connect/${ip}:${port}`; window.location.href = steamConnectUrl; } }
